byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Kathmandu and Nida Najar from New Delhi
byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Relatives of some of five Nepalese civilians who died in May 2015 Marine helicopter crash express anger at slow pace of investigation and demand compensation from Nepal and United States.
lead_paragraph: The civilians were among 13 people killed when the helicopter went down during an American relief mission sent to Nepal after an earthquake in May.

headline.main: Families of Nepalese Killed in Marine Helicopter Crash Ask for Compensation
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Nepal: Crash Victims’ Relatives Protest

snippet: The civilians were among 13 people killed when the helicopter went down during an American relief mission sent to Nepal after an earthquake in May.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
